articles.title: Floral Basket from Chinese Party
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Chinese Party
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by the C.C., the Communist Party of China on the occasion of his birthday. 
					 It was handed to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, by Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, on Friday.

articles.title: National Fine Arts Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Fine Arts Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A national fine arts exhibition opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang International Cultural Centre Friday in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed are over 50 drawings showing feats of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and their personality as great persons.
					
					 There are also pieces representing the faith and will of all the soldiers and people to accelerate the building of a thriving nation under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Nung Su, officials concerned and artists and citizens here.
					
					 An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, made an opening address.

articles.title: Two Million Visit Oun Revolutionary Site for Decade
articles.content:
Two Million Visit Oun Revolutionary Site for Decade
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Oun Revolutionary Site is visited by an endless stream of soldiers of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and school youth and children in the run-up to the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 The site in Ryongsong District in Pyongyang is the place in which he energetically conducted ideological, theoretical and military activities during the military camping from August 20 to October 4, 1962.
					
					 Displayed there are the Dear Leader's Quarters, the range where he showed the marksmanship worthy of a crack shot, heavy machine gun he disassembled and assembled and historic relics and materials telling that he led campers to arm themselves with the Juche-oriented military idea and tactics.
					
					 The number of visitors increased every year, bringing the total number of visitors to the site during the past decade to more than two million.

articles.title: Congratulations from Foreigners
articles.content:
Congratulations from Foreigners
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a message of greetings and gifts from personages of Ecuador and Kuwait on the occasion of his birthday.
					 They were the chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification and the general manager of the United Gulf Construction Co. W.L.L. of Kuwait.
					
					 The message and gifts were handed to officials of the DPRK embassies in Iran and Kuwait by the councilor of the Ecuadorian embassy in Iran and the general manager of the company of the Kuwait on Jan. 25 and Feb. 1.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Chinese
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Chinese
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket Friday on the occasion of his birthday. It came from the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong who is related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in France and Thailand
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in France and Thailand
						
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Film shows were held in France and Thailand on Feb. 2 and 3 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were personages of the French Intellectuals' Study Association for Independent Development, University of Paris 5, University of Sorbonne of France, the Thai Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16, the Thai Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, the Rajabat Pranakorn University of Thailand and the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and masses.
					
					 They watched Korean films "Arms of Korea" and "We Will Follow You to the End of the Earth".

articles.title: Kimilsungia Exhibition Opened in Guinea
articles.content:
Kimilsungia Exhibition Opened in Guinea
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A week of visit to the Kimilsungia Greenhouse was opened in Guinea on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Its opening ceremony took place on Feb. 1.
					
					 On display were potted Kimilsungias, flower of the sun, in full bloom.
					
					 The chairman of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association of Guinea said that the Association set the week of visit in order to help the people of Guinea get better understanding of the greatness of President Kim Il Sung. It is also intended to make them grasp deeply the noble will of Kim Jong Il to hold Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK with the immortal flower, he added.

articles.title: DPRK Exhibition Opens in Brazil
articles.content:
DPRK Exhibition Opens in Brazil
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibition opened in Brazil on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Its opening ceremony took place on Feb. 1.
					
					 Displayed were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their undying feats and books, photos and handicrafts introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present there were personages of Santos City Office of Sao Paulo State and the Brazilian Communist Party and masses.
					
					 The deputy mayor of the Santos City said that he was pleased with the exhibition being opened in the city.
					
					 He evinced pledge to make efforts to deepen the understanding and boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two peoples, in the future, too.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised in Russia
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised in Russia
						
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Moscow on February 8 on the occasion of February 16, birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos on their immortal exploits.
					
					 Present there were Mojgovoy, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, Vanin, first vice-chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, and other personages of various circles and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Il is the greatest statesman and prominent thinker and theoretician in the present era.
					
					 They praised him as the leader of the people who devotes his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 It is thanks to the original Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il that the socialist cause of the DPRK has victoriously advanced despite the moves of the imperialists to stifle it, they added.
					
					 They said that under his leadership the army of the DPRK has demonstrated its might as matchless powerful army and main forces for building a thriving nation. They praised the Songun politics as an all-powerful treasured sword for carrying out socialism.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Party Leaders
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Party Leaders
						
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on Feb. 2 and 3 to mark the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a meeting in Romania and round-table talks in Mexico.
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, said that the birthday of Kim Jong Il is a significant day for not only the Korean people but also the progressive mankind.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has raised the DPRK to the position of a politico-ideological and military power under the banner of Songun, he stressed.
					
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, praised the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il who has wisely led the Workers' Party of Korea and the army and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 Today the DPRK is squarely standing against the U.S. and it is unthinkable without his matchless courage, pluck and Songun leadership, the coordinator said, adding: His exploits will shine long as treasure of the whole mankind.

articles.title: Birthday of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Birthday of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Democratic Congo and France on January 29 and February 2 on the occasion of February 16, birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were personages and members of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo and the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea.
					
					 Nzemba Yangana, chairman of the Democratic Congolese Group, and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il as a genuine leader of the people who devotes his all to the completion of the revolutionary cause of Juche and happiness of the Korean people.
					
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group, noted that Kim Jong Il's motto is to believe in people as in Heaven. The DPRK would surely stand high in the world as a thriving nation as he pursues the great Songun politics as the leader of the people, he added.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar in France.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Inspects Newly Built Unsan Instrument Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Inspects Newly Built Unsan Instrument Factory
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the newly built Unsan Instrument Factory.
					 After looking round the room dedicated to the history of the factory, he went round its different places to learn in detail about its construction and technical equipment. 
					
					 He was greatly satisfied to watch varieties of quality instruments being churned out in an endless stream from the production processes equipped with CNC machine tools and robots. He said that the factory built on the basis of latest science and technology is an ultra-modern factory reflecting the appearance of the ideal society desired by the Korean people. 
					
					 It is a big miracle that the workers of the factory and officials and other working people of North Phyongan Province have radically changed the appearance of the factory and brought about a revolution in the instrument production in a short span of time by pooling efforts and wisdom with technicians of the Ryonha Machine Management Bureau, he said, highly appreciating their laudable feats and extending thanks to all the builders and helpers. 
					
					 The factory which has undergone so dramatic changes that its former appearance is untraceable is another great structure in the era of Songun of which the country can boast in terms of its production capability and technical equipment, he said. 
					
					 The workers of the factory could work the world-startling miracle by backing the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude with latest science and technology, he noted, adding with confidence that this proves if one has a firm grasp on science and technology, one can ride Chollima. 
					
					 Very pleased that the factory is capable of providing a sufficient number of instruments required by the nation's machine-building industry making a leaping advance, breaking through latest science, he personally proposed awarding Kim Il Sung Prize to the CNC-based instrument streamline of the best level and high state commendations to its developers. 
					
					The stirring reality in the factory proves that it is possible to attain any goal of ultra-modern science and technology when strong mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation, inexhaustible creative ingenuity and solid technical and economic potentials are displayed, he stressed.
					
					 He went round the cultural hall, canteen and other cultural and welfare establishments built in a peculiar style to learn in detail about the cultural life and supply service there.
					
					 He was greatly pleased to see the cultural hall and canteen which look as splendid as theatres and restaurants in a city.
					
					 He advanced the tasks to be fulfilled to operate and manage the factory.
					
					 He set the long-term targets to be attained by the factory and specified the orientation and ways to do so.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the workers of the factory would achieve more signal successes in making a revolution in the production of instruments in the future, too, and thus contribute to placing the national economy on a Juche, modern and scientific basis.
					
					 He had a photo session with those who performed labour feats in the construction of the factory.
					
					 Accompanying him were Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Pak To Chun, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Ri Man Gon, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Iranian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Ambassador Hosts Reception
						
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, Friday arranged a reception on the 32nd anniversary of the victory of the Islamic Revolution in Iran. 
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labor, and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 On hand were staff members of the Iranian embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Lagoon Samil, Time-honored Scenic Spot
articles.content:
Lagoon Samil, Time-honored Scenic Spot
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- There is Lagoon Samil on the east coast of Kangwon Province, the DPRK. It has been known to be one of the eight tourist attractions of Kwandong district since ancient times.
					 Located close to Mt. Kumgang, a world famous mountain, Lagoon Samil covers 0.79 square kilometers and is the deepest of the lagoons in Korea.
					
					 Its name derived from a folktale that in time immemorial a king went there to enjoy a day but he found so fantastic scenery that he spent three days there.
					
					 Lagoon Samil looks like a picture as 36 big and small peaks tower around it like a folding screen, it is full of clean water and has several islets. 
					
					 Graceful pavilions and strange rocks on the islets add to the scenic beauty of the lagoon.
					
					 On the shore northwest of the lagoon there are a beach, lawn, spring called Mongchon, etc. and on the shore east of the lagoon a bamboo field, providing good places for recreation. 
					
					 The lagoon teems with a lot of fishes including carp, silver carp and ice fish.
					
					 It is associated with the erasable traces left by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu who made sure that the picturesque area was turned into a recreation ground for the working people.

articles.title: Folk Song Representing Hard-working Koreans
articles.content:
Folk Song Representing Hard-working Koreans
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Lyric song "Ryonggangginari," one of the famous folk songs in Korea, truthfully represents the work of Koreans.
					 Its words vividly describe their work and its melody is jovial and enchanting. 
					
					 The song, a combination of Kinari tune and Tharyong tune for dance originating from the Ryonggang area, has been popular among working people. 
					
					 Wherever rice-planting, weeding and spinning and other work are done this song became favorite for people.
					
					 Still now one can hear a story about "Kinari", a song which people like to sing alternately, when visiting Ryonggang and Kangso areas. 
					
					 Orchestral music "A Bumper Harvest in the Chongsan Plain" composed in the 1970s made a successful musical representation of the spirit and optimism of agricultural workers. This is based on the melodic characteristics of "Ryonggangginari." 
					
					  The song is still regarded as an important element of orchestral music and liked by people for its attractive melody.

articles.title: Korean Children's Folk Game
articles.content:
Korean Children's Folk Game 
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- There is a play with gravel stones among the interesting colorful Korean folk games. It helps children improve their intelligence and promote their agility.
					 Each of the two teams is made up of two girls or more. They play the game with gravel stones, each with about 1 or 1.5 centimeter in diameter, displaying hand skill.
					
					 It has been called "gravel stone collecting", "gravel stone grasping", "gravel stone lifting" and "snatching" according to localities and historical backgrounds.
					
					 There are more than a hundred methods of playing the game. But it can be classified mainly into two categories according to the number of those stones involved.
					
					 The first category is the game played with four or five gravel stones and the other is the game to win as many gravel stones as possible with many ones. 
					
					 The first category of game is played as follows: Each player places four gravel stones before the participants one by one out of the five gravel stones before lifting the remaining one and grasping the one on the ground simultaneously. One can grasp one gravel stone, two gravel stones and three ones and all the remaining gravel stones before the fall of a gravel stone. A player lifts one gravel stone a bit while keeping four gravel stones in his hand and grasps it before its fall. 
					
					 The game is very diverse in its methods like those of hatching eggs and installing a rice-cooking pot. 
					
					 The second category of the game is played as follows: A circle of about 50 or 60 centimeters in diameter is drawn and gravel stones are distributed inside it before fixing the other line to start the game. The team which collects more gravel stones according to the defined rules wins the game.
					
					 The play with gravel stones is the most popular among little girls as it can be played anywhere.

articles.title: Korea Boasts Animal Painter
articles.content:
Korea Boasts Animal Painter
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Ri Am (1499-?) was a typical Korean animal colorist representing the art in the 16th century but he is still remembered by Koreans for his talent.
					 He drew many beautiful color paintings rich in national flavor unlike the trend of painting at that time when drawings were done in the literary artist's style and black-and-white paintings drawn in the main.
					
					 "Cat and Puppy", "Cat on Tree", "A Pair of Wild Geese", "Mother Dog" are among his paintings known so far.
					
					 Typical of them are "Cat and Puppy" and "Cat on Tree" based on the story about what happened in the world of animals.
					
					 He truthfully represented the ecological characters and life of animals with his delicate observation and ability to make accurate sketch, making every painting pervade with children's mind and cheerful and humorous attraction.
					
					 His drawings are well known not only in Korea but abroad for their high artistic value. 
					
					 He was unique in painting style as he applied life-like and dynamic technique of representation strong in native flavor.

articles.title: US Criticized for Interfering in Russia's Affairs
articles.content:
US Criticized for Interfering in Russia's Affairs 
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The United States has interfered in internal affairs of Russia over the Nemtsov case.
					 Nemtsov, former first vice-prime minister of Russia, was arrested for his resistance to police during a demonstration staged in Moscow on the eve of the New Year.
					
					 The State Duma stated that Nemtsov was arrested because he attempted to break through a police cordon, an act that conflicts with the regulations of demonstration and creates danger to people's safety.
					
					 The United States, however, has accused Russia of the arrest, terming it an unreasonable, deplorable and regrettable thing.
					
					 A State Duma committee condemned the United States for favoring such publicly recognized illegal act as disobedience to police.
					
					 In a press conference, the vice-chairman in charge of Russia-U.S. relations of the State Duma International Affairs Committee voiced misgivings and disappointment over remarks of U.S. State Department officials.
					
					 Russia respects the sovereignty of the United States and does not want to interfere in the U.S. judicial system and court business, he said. Russia wants the United States to do so as regards Russia's legitimate rights.
					
					 Meanwhile, State Duma members and social activists of Russia reportedly advised U.S. senators to refrain from poking their nose into others' affairs. They described the senators' remarks supporting Nemtsov as interference in Russia's internal affairs.

articles.title: US Troubled by Smartphone
articles.content:
US Troubled by Smartphone
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The United States has been troubled by smartphones in hands of prisoners. 
					 The multi-functional phone helps them smuggle drug and pistols into jails and even communicate with each other to stage a mass breakout from jails.
					
					 A criminal syndicate boss reportedly issued orders to his men outside jail.
					
					 The phone also helps detainees expose jailers' maltreatment, defaming the United States styling itself a "champion of human rights".
					
					 In a bid to solve the problem, jamming and monitoring devices have been installed in jails. But it seems that they are not enough to put all of the several million detainees under surveillance.
					
					 Besides, the U.S. communication law does not allow blocking licensed frequency wave.
					
					 Another plan to solve the problem is to detect smartphones with the help of sniper dogs, but it is also viewed not to be a good idea. 
					
					 Many Americans are of the opinion that an effective remedy is to sharply reduce the number of detainees.
					
					 But it is unlikely that criminals will be decreased in the United States, where all manners of social evil and injustice stalk.

articles.title: Japan Pursues New Defense System for Militarization
articles.content:
Japan Pursues New Defense System for Militarization
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- It is a longtime goal of Japan to get the status of a "normal state" from a defeated nation.
					 For this purpose, Japan has carried out some defense reforms.
					
					 The Japanese Diet passed a bill on upgrading the defense agency to a ministry through both houses in November and December 2006 respectively. With an inaugural ceremony held on January 9, 2007, the defense ministry started its operation. 
					
					 It is seen as a crucial step toward a "normal state", an indication that there has been a change in an important feature of the "peace state" that had kept the status of the defense body on a low level after the last world war.
					
					 The position and role of the defense sector have also been raised in the national strategy.
					
					 The defense minister took over from the prime minister the authority of the overseas troop dispatch and material assistance to the United States. Complicated deliberation procedures and restrictions have been sharply reduced and the power of decision enhanced in the defense sector. 
					
					 Meanwhile, Japan has strengthened the systems for coping with an emergency and for taking part in UN peace-keeping operations.
					
					 Japan's new defense system is viewed as part of the preparations for militarization and reinvasion.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Plot to Torpedo Inter-Korean Dialogue
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Plot to Torpedo Inter-Korean Dialogue
						
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The collapse of the dialogue between the militaries of the north and the south is a natural product of the south Korean puppet forces to scuttle the inter-Korean dialogue.
					 This found a vivid manifestation in the course of fixing the dates for the preliminary talks for the high-level military talks and the opening of the full-dress talks. 
					
					 The north side proposed around late in January as the date for the preliminary talks and around the first ten-days of February as the date for opening the full-dress talks in a bid to move up the date for the talks even a day.
					
					 The group of traitors, however, deliberately put off the dates for the talks under the pretext of lunar New Year and the January 15th on the lunar calendar. 
					
					 Even after being compelled to come out to the negotiating table, they despicably behaved in a bid to set late in February as the date for the full-dress talks under this or that pretext. 
					
					 The above-said holidays are peculiar to the Korean nation. 
					
					 Koreans in the north and the south have the same custom in which families and relatives and neighbors meet with each other to enjoy holidays and deepen kindred feelings. Nothing is greater pleasure for the Koreans if sincere dialogue is conducted on the occasion of the national holidays to make progress in the process for improving the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 This is a behavior of attaching importance to the nation and a true patriotic stand and approach towards dialogue to promote the interests and prosperity of the nation. 
					
					 Then what do they really seek in deliberately putting off the date for the military dialogue?
					
					 Their real intention was to fix around late in February when Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises targeting the north are expected to be staged throughout south Korea in collusion with foreign forces as the date for the full-dress talks in a bid to lead elsewhere the north side's condemnation. They, at the same time, foolishly sought to shift the blame for the collapse of the talks onto the north side. 
					
					 The action taken by them to put off the talks was aimed at totally blocking the north-south dialogue and again escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Intolerable is the behavior of the group of traitors which brought to rupture the military dialogue arranged with much effort to improve the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: KCNA Assails S. Korean Side's "Three-phase Unification Proposal"
articles.content:
KCNA Assails S. Korean Side's "Three-phase Unification Proposal" 
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The group of traitors of south Korea is now becoming vociferous about the "three-phase unification proposal."
					It advanced the above-said proposal as a way for achieving "unification" in August last year by putting together the "proposal for unification of the Korean community" offered by Roh Tae Woo in the past and watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3000 dollars".
					
					 The proposal is, in the final analysis, a traitorous confrontation proposal aimed to force the DPRK to disarm itself and realize the ambition to achieve "the unification of systems" in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the group of traitors has much touted the above-said proposal since the very beginning of the year, a clear proof that it seeks confrontation and division, indifferent to the dialogue and reunification.
					
					 This proposal is a blatant perfidy to the June 15 joint declaration which recognized the common points in the north-proposed low-level federation and the south-proposed confederation and called on the north and the south to work for reunification in that direction.
					
					 It is also fraught with the danger of confrontation and war.
					
					 The north-south relations have been pushed to the brink of a war in recent days entirely because of the south Korean puppet forces' pursuance of the policy for achieving "unification through absorption."
					
					 When the north and the south agreed on the way of achieving reunification by federal formula in the June 15 joint declaration, the north-south relations made smooth progress toward reunification. No one thought of a war at that time.
					
					 The north-south relations grew extremely tense and the danger of a war increased as the present south Korean authorities came out with the above-said proposal which presupposed swallowing the north up in total denial of the joint declaration. 
					
					 Neither the north nor the south is willing to concede its ideology and system to the other side.
					
					 The reality indicates that what reunification mode the politicians and personages of all strata in the north and the south choose is a vital issue on which hinge the national reunification and national disaster.
					
					 It is hard to expect the genuine north-south dialogue, to say nothing of the improved north-south relations for national reconciliation and reunification as long as there is a group dreaming of "unification through absorption" within the nation.
					
					 The way of achieving reunification by federal formula is the one for peaceful reunification premised on co-existence.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should respect the above-said mode agreed upon by both sides for detente on the Korean Peninsula and improved north-south relations, away from the foolish ambition for the "unification of systems".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Reunification
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il is the peerlessly great man steering the Koreans' struggle for national reunification to victory with his rare ideo-theoretical wisdom and distinguished leadership ability.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article. 
					
					 The article goes on to say:
					
					 His leadership over national reunification is scientific one based on the far-sighted wisdom and distinguished ideo-theoretical features. It is also the guidance of great unity and invincibility advancing the cause of national reunification by dint of the great might of national unity through strengthening of the driving forces and steadily bringing about surge in this cause despite trials.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated as the three charters for national reunification the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme for great national unity and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, advanced by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 His five-point policy for great national unity serves as an immortal reunification programme as it indicates the correct way for developing the cause of great national unity, started and led by the President, on to a new higher stage.
					
					 The idea of "By our nation itself" advanced by him still remains the brilliant banner of victory in the June 15 era of reunification. 
					
					 His ardent patriotism and great benevolence have served as mental nutrient encouraging all Koreans to turn out in the patriotic road of reunification. 
					
					 It is quite natural that the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad are now holding him in high esteem as the centre of great national unity while lauding his politics for national reunification as benevolent and all-embracing politics.
					
					 He brings about radical turn in the cause of national reunification despite manifold hardships, taking the initiative at all times over the situation with his adroit and consummate strategy and tested leadership art. Under his distinguished and tested leadership the Korean nation could emerge victorious in the movement for national reunification in the past decades.

articles.title: Undying Feats by Kim Jong Il in Defending Socialism
articles.content:
Undying Feats by Kim Jong Il in Defending Socialism
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The victorious advance of the socialist cause would be unthinkable without the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul with total dedication despite challenges of history and storms, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article.
					 Kim Jong Il breathed life and injected energy into the world socialist movement in the late 20th century when the socialist cause was at stake, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 He published "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party," "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" and other works. He clarified the cause of the collapse of socialism in some countries, its historical lesson, the truth and scientific accuracy of socialism and inevitability of its victory.
					
					 Thanks to his outstanding leadership the imperialists' divide-and-crush tactics to disorganize and obliterate the world socialist movement were shattered and it could advance along the road of a new upswing after readjusting its ranks.
					
					 The daily refers to his Songun revolutionary leadership and the greatness and enormous vitality of his Songun politics.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 The high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists challenging the desire of mankind for global peace and stability are rampant in the international arena.
					
					 They are laying military siege to the DPRK and resorting to vicious media warfare and psychological warfare slandering it.
					
					 The might of Songun rendered the U.S. stick of aggression ineffective. 
					
					 The trend of the times to learn from the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il is becoming stronger day by day. This goes to clearly prove that the Songun politics is, indeed, the banner of victory of the human cause of independence and peace against imperialism and an almighty treasured sword for accomplishing the socialist cause.

articles.title: GNP's Move to Stay in Power Denounced
articles.content:
GNP's Move to Stay in Power Denounced
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea assailed the "Grand National Party" for turning away from the people's livelihood and trying to stay in power. He issued a commentary on February 8.
					 The commentary disclosed that the GNP is absorbed in the discussion of constitutional revision only inside party headquarters, not allowing anyone to go out after locking up the door.
					
					 It is a known fact that this discussion was prompted by an intention of the present ruling forces to stay in power, the commentary said.
					
					 It is not proper to be locked in an armchair argument at a time when the people mire in predicament, suffering from foot-and-mouth diseases, sharp price hike, etc.
					
					 With nothing can the GNP cover its nature as a party pursuing its interests only, the commentary said, urging it to take it to heart.

articles.title: Reunification Regarded as Important Issue in S. Korean Society
articles.content:
Reunification Regarded as Important Issue in S. Korean Society
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The proportion of the south Koreans who said they would cheer players of the north when they play a football match with those of the U.S. was just 21 percent in the middle of the 1980s but it increased to 70 percent last year, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 This was pointed out in the report titled "The south Koreans' consciousness of reunification and the long-term change of their attitude" worked out by Prof.  Un Ki Su at the Institute for International Studies of Seoul National University, it noted, and went on: 
					
					 According to the report, the number of those who said they would cheer the north during the football match with the U.S. rapidly increased every year from 1986 to 1990 and it showed a steady increase over the last three years.
					
					 Explaining the reason why it is necessary to achieve reunification, many respondents observed: "We are the same nation", "To avert the outbreak of a war", "To build a developed nation", etc.
					
					 The professor explained in his report: "As seen in the opinion poll on which team one would like to cheer during the football match between the north and the U.S. the understanding of the north underwent a dramatic change in the latter half of the 1980s. It seems this result is attributable to the fact that south Koreans saw the north from a new angle as members of the same nation after the demise of the Cold War."
					
					 "Reunification is still regarded as an import issue in the south Korean society," it observed.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Reunification Movement under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Reunification Movement under Fire
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Civic and Public Joint Measure Committee for Coping with Suppression of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) in south Korea held a press conference on February 8 to condemn the authorities for suppression of the reunification movement.
					 In a press release the organization accused the prosecution of making investigation into Ri Kyu Jae, chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, Ri Kyong Won, its secretary general, and Choe Un A, its agitation chairperson, from Feb. 8.
					
					 It denounced the authorities for turning away from the people's anxiety and sufferings, persisting in confrontation with fellow countrymen and clamping down on the reunification movement forces, while rejecting the north's proposal for dialogue.
					
					 It demanded the authorities immediately stop the suppression unsuitable to an atmosphere of dialogue.

articles.title: Application of Tuition-Waiver Program to Korean Schools Called for
articles.content:
Application of Tuition-Waiver Program to Korean Schools Called for 
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- On February 7 Sankei Shimbun of Japan carried an article titled "' Insincere, indeed,' the director-general of Korean school accuses the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of putting on hold the restart of procedures for applying tuition-waiver program to Korean schools." It said:
					 Director-general Kim Sun On and other officials concerned of Tokyo Korean School had a press interview as regards the above-said issue and bitterly denounced the ministry for its lack of sincerity.
					
					 "Why the ministry is discriminating against the children who are studying hard with peace in mind?" They queried. 
					
					 According to Jiji Press Ltd., Deputy Head Mataichi and Chairman of the Policy Council Abe of the Social-Democratic Party met Deputy Chief Cabinet Secretaries Fujii and Fukuyama on the same day and asked for an early lifting of the stop to the procedures for applying the tuition-free program to Korean schools.
					
					 The news agency quoted Fujii and others as saying they would fully meet the request and properly discuss it.
					
					 Later Mataichi told reporters that the tuition-free program means helping children go to school and has nothing to do with the political situation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet by Finnish Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet by Finnish Organization
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on Internet homepage the full text of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" on Feb. 5.
					 The work was published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003). It clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea are the powerful political mode in the present era that carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army. It also elucidates the scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflects the requirements of the times and the revolution. The validity and advantages of the Songun politics and its great vitality are also expounded in the work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la fabrica de herramientas de Unsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la fabrica de herramientas de Unsan 
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Herramientas de Unsan construida nuevamente.
					  Tras pasar por la sala de presentacion del historial, el Dirigente averiguo en detalles el estado de construccion y equipos tecnicos recorriendo varios lugares de la fabrica.
					
					  Al ver la produccion serial de diferentes herramientas de buena calidad en los procesos productivos automatizados con maquinas herramientas CNC y robots, se puso muy contento diciendo que la fabrica construida basandose en la ciencia y tecnica de punta es la altamente civilizada y moderna que muestra el aspecto de la sociedad ideal sonada por el pueblo coreano.
					
					  Los obreros de la fabrica, los funcionarios y trabajadores de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte reconstruyeron esta fabrica en un corto plazo uniendo las fuerzas e inteligencia con los tecnicos de la Direccion de Maquinaria Ryonha y produjeron una innovacion en la produccion de implementos, afirmo y agrego que eso se llama gran milagro.
					
					Aprecio altamente los meritos brillantes de ellos y agradecio a todos los constructores y voluntarios.
					
					Senalo que esta fabrica transformada de modo irreconocible es otra gran creacion de la epoca del Songun, de que puede enorgullecerse tanto en la capacidad como en la calidad de equipos tecnicos.
					
					Los obreros de la fabrica pudieron crear este milagro, que sorprende al mundo, porque combinaron su espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y lucha tenaz con las ciencias y tecnicas ultramodernas, destaco y anadio que a ese modo de trabajar se dice que uno puede ser jinete de Chollima (corcel legendario) si se apoya en la ciencia y la tecnica.
					
					Muy complacido de que la fabrica haya adquirido la capacidad de suministrar satisfactoriamente las herramientas demandadas por la industria de maquinaria de Corea que se desarrolla subitamente conquistando el nivel sofisticado, propuso personalmente otorgar el Premio Kim Il Sung a la cadena automatica de produccion de herramientas de maximo nivel, hecha con la tecnologia CNC, y altas condecoraciones estatales a los desarrolladores de ella. 
					
					Subrayo que la orgullosa realidad de la fabrica comprueba que cuando movilicen el firme espiritu, inagotables talentos creativos y solida potencialidad tecnico-economica de la nacion de Kim Il Sung, es posible alcanzar cualquier nivel super-sofisticado.
					
					Recorriendo la casa de cultura construida originalmente, el comedor y otras instalaciones culturales y de intendencia, se entero detalladamente del estado de vida cultural y de autoabastecimiento y se puso muy contento de que esas facilidades hayan sido acondicionadas magnificamente como teatros y restaurantes urbanos.
					
					Presento las tareas que se presentan en la administracion y la operacion de la fabrica.
					
					Definio la meta a ser alcanzada por la fabrica y enseno el rumbo y remedios.
					
					Expresando su gran esperanza y conviccion de que la clase obrera de la fabrica contribuira activamente en el futuro tambien a la jucheanizacion, modernizacion y cientifizacion de la economia nacional al lograr mayores exitos orgullosos en la innovacion de herramientas, se fotografio junto a los innovadores que realizaron meritos laborales en la construccion de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Pak To Chun, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del BP y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y Ri Man Gon, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores del CC de PCCh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores del CC de PCCh
						
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el cesto de flores que con motivo de su cumpleanos, le dirigiera el Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China.
					El embajador chino en Corea, Liu Hongcai, lo entrego el dia 11 a Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: ATCC comenta el "proyecto de reunificacion de 3 etapas"
articles.content:
ATCC comenta el "proyecto de reunificacion de 3 etapas"
  Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- Ahora la banda de traidores surcoreanos insiste obstinadamente en el "proyecto de reunificacion de tres etapas".
					Ellos lo presentaron en agosto del ano pasado ajustando el "proyecto de reunificacion de la comunidad nacional", presentado en el pasado por el traidor Roh Thae Woo, a la doctrina de "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3000 dolares".
					
					  Si adelantamos la conclusion, ese proyecto de caracter antinacional busca el enfrentamiento porque persigue la meta de desarmar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras y realizar la ambicion de "reunificar mediante la fusion de regimenes". 
					
					  Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos vuelven a abogarlo desde el principio de este ano. 
					
					  Este hecho comprueba una vez mas que ellos no tienen interes en el dialogo ni en la reunificacion sino persiguen solo la confrontacion y la division. 
					
					  El "proyecto de reunificacion de tres etapas" entrana la confrontacion y la guerra y traiciona la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, en que ambas partes coreanas acordaron orientar la reunificacion reconociendo el punto comun entre el proyecto de la parte Norte de establecer el regimen federal de bajo nivel y la propuesta de la parte Sur de lograr la union. 
					
					  Ahora las relaciones intercoreanas estan en la peor fase llegando al borde de guerra, debido a los proyectos de los titeres surcoreanos por el estilo de la "reunificacion mediante absorcion". 
					
					  Cuando el Norte y el Sur de Corea aprobaron la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio llegando al acuerdo sobre el modo de reunificacion segun el sistema federal, las relaciones bilaterales se desarrollaban sin complicaciones hacia la reunificacion y no se pensaba nunca en la guerra.
					
					Pero, las autoridades surcoreanas en el poder negaron totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y presentaron el "proyecto de reunificacion de tres etapas" cuya premisa es derrumbar y tomar al Norte, de modo que se empeoraran las relaciones N-S y se incrementara el peligro de guerra.
					
					Hoy dia, ambas partes coreanas no quieren ceder sus ideas y regimenes.
					
					La realidad comprueba que la seleccion del modo de reunificacion por parte de los politicos y las personalidades de diferentes sectores del Norte y el Sur es la cuestion vital que decide la reunificacion o el colapso de la nacion.
					
					Mientras exista en el interior de la nacion coreana la camarilla que suena con la "reunificacion mediante absorcion", nunca habra el dialogo sincero N-S, ni el desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas por la reconciliacion y reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					El modo federal es la via de reunificacion pacifica basada en la coexistencia.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deberan salir de su necia ambicion de "reunificar mediante la fusion de regimenes" para el alivio de la tensa situacion en la Peninsula Coreana y la mejora de las relaciones N-S y respetar el metodo federal acordado entre ambas partes.

articles.title: ATCC comenta la artimana para romper el dialogo Norte-Sur
articles.content:
ATCC comenta la artimana para romper el dialogo Norte-Sur 
  Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- La ruptura del dialogo militar Norte-Sur de Corea fue producto inevitable de la artimana de los titeres surcoreanos que se ha revelado en fijar la fecha de dialogo previo y de las conversaciones militares de alto nivel.
					  Para adelantar la fecha en todo lo posible, nuestra parte propuso a la parte Sur sostener el dialogo previo a finales de enero y las conversaciones principales, en la primera mitad de febrero. 
					
					  Pero, la banda de traidores surcoreanos la retraso intencionalmente pretextando los dias feriados del Ano Nuevo Lunar y la fiesta folclorica del 15 de enero lunar. 
					
					  Al sentarse a desganas a la mesa del dialogo, actuo groseramente para dilatar para finales de febrero la fecha de conversaciones militares de alto nivel.
					
					  El Ano Nuevo Lunar y el 15 de enero lunar son fiestas folcloricas tanto para el Norte como para el Sur. 
					
					  Si se realiza el dialogo sincero con motivo de esas fiestas y se logra algun avance en la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas, esto pondra mas alegre que nunca a la nacion coreana. 
					
					  Asi podria conceder prioridad a la nacion y tomar la posicion patriotica de promover los intereses y la prosperidad de la nacion. 
					
					  Los titeres surcoreanos propusieron la fecha de las conversaciones para finales de febrero, en que se librarian en toda la extension surcoreana los ejercicios militares "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, en su necio intento de suscitar la repulsion de nuestra parte e imputar a esta la responsabilidad por la ruptura del dialogo. 
					
					  Son imperdonables las artimanas de la banda de traidores surcoreanos que llevo a la ruptura el dialogo militar Norte-Sur preparado dificilmente.

articles.title: Smartphone - dolor de cabeza de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Smartphone - dolor de cabeza de EE.UU. 
  Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- En Estados Unidos los prisioneros actuan libremente usando Smartphones, producto de ciencias y tecnologias de punta. 
					   Introducen drogas y armas en la carcel abusando de distintas funciones de ese aparato y conspiran hasta la fuga colectiva manteniendo la comunicacion entre si.
					
					  Se conocio que el cabecilla de una pandilla daba ordenes a sus subalternos desde la celda. 
					
					  Por otra parte, los reos revelan con Smartphone los maltratos inhumanitarios de los carceleros haciendo pasar tremenda pena a EE.UU. autodenominado como "defensor de derechos humanos". 
					
					  Perplejas ante tal situacion, las autoridades carcelarias andan atareadas para instalar los interruptores de las ondas de telefonia celular y otros aparatos que captan las comunicaciones telefonicas y el intercambio de mensajes. 
					
					  Pero, los especialistas estiman que sera dificil vigilar todos los movimientos de millones de recluidos. 
					
					  Para colmo, la ley de comunicaciones de EE.UU. no autoriza la interrupcion de ondas hertzianas oficiales. 
					
					  Entonces, ellas confiaron al olfato de perros la busqueda de Smartphones de los prisioneros, lo cual tambien les sale mal. 
					
					  Muchos norteamericanos insisten en que la receta esta en reducir en todo lo posible el numero de presos. 
					
					  Pero, en la sociedad estadounidense donde imperan los males sociales de todo tipo y la injusticia, no puede disminuir nunca la cifra de delincuentes. Por lo tanto, EE.UU. nunca podra quitarse ese dolor de cabeza.

articles.title: EE.UU. interviene en el caso de Nemtsov
articles.content:
EE.UU. interviene en el caso de Nemtsov
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos interviene en los asuntos internos de Rusia aprovechando el caso del ex primer vicepremier Nemtzob.
					  En visperas del Ano Nuevo, el fue arrestado por los agentes del Ministerio del Interior por oponer resistencia durante la manifestacion efectuada bajo la aprobacion de la municipalidad de Moscu.
					
					  Al respecto, la Duma Estatal rusa explico que "el fue arrestado cuando trato de burlar el cordon policial. Esta accion contraviene a la regla sobre la manifestacion y pone en peligro la seguridad de los ciudadanos".
					
					  Sin embargo, EE.UU. condeno a Rusia hablando tanto de "detencion injusta", "asunto vergonzoso y deplorable" y "es una lastima".
					
					  Un comite de la Duma Estatal apunto asi "sorprende mucho el gesto de EE.UU. de valorar la accion de Nemtsov que desobedecio a los funcionarios judiciales, lo cual resulta ilegal en todo el mundo".
					
					  El vicepresidente encargado de relaciones Rusia-EE.UU. del Comite de Asuntos Internacionales de la Duma expreso en la entrevista de prensa su recelo y desilusion de los dichos de los funcionarios del Departamento de Estado norteamericano.
					
					  "Rusia respeta la soberania nacional de EE.UU. y no trata de intervenir en el sistema judicial y el trabajo de los tribunales de este pais. Podemos esperar que EE.UU. actue tambien de esa manera cuando se discuta el problema de cumplimiento en Rusia de los derechos convenientes a la constitucionalidad ", destaco el.
					
					  Los diputados a la Duma Estatal y los activitas sociales de Rusia interpretaron como intervencion en los asuntos internos de su pais las palabras de los senadores estadounidenses, que apoyaron a Nemtsov, etc. aconsejandoles que no metan la nariz en los asuntos ajenos.

articles.title: Critican la injusta conducta del Ministerio de Educacion de Japon
articles.content:
Critican la injusta conducta del Ministerio de Educacion de Japon
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- Sankei Shimbun de Japon publico el dia 7 el articulo intitulado "'Es muy insincero', el director de la escuela coreana critica al Ministerio de Educacion, Cultura, Deporte, Ciencia y Tecnologia por dejar pendiente la reanudacion de la tramitacion para la gratuidad de clases".
					  Con respecto a que "se pospuso la reanudacion de la tramitacion para la gratuidad de clases" en las escuelas coreanas, el director de la Escuela Coreana de Tokio Kim Sun On y otros interesados condenaron mordazmente en una entrevista de prensa al ministerio mencionado diciendo que "es muy insincero", senalo el rotativo.
					
					  Prosiguio que Kim Sun On y otros oradores preguntaron: "?Por que quieren discriminar a los ninos que siempre piensan en la paz y se esfuerzan por ella?".
					
					  Por otra parte, de acuerdo con Jiji, el vicepresidente del Partido Democratico Social de Japon, Mataichi, y el presidente de consulta politica del mismo partido, Abe, se reunieron el dia 7 con los subdirectores del Secretariado del Gabinete, Fujii y Fukuyama, y les exigieron que "cancelen pronto la medida de suspender la tramitacion para la gratuidad de clases" en las escuelas coreanas.
					
					  La fuente agrego que Fujii y otros dijeron que "examinarian bien esa demanda".
					
					  Despues, Mataichi apunto a los periodistas que "la ensenanza gratuita no tiene nada que ver con la situacion politica porque contribuye a la asistencia de los ninos a las clases", finalizo.

articles.title: Japon impulsa la reestructuracion del sistema de defensa
articles.content:
Japon impulsa la reestructuracion del sistema de defensa
						
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- Sigue invariable la meta de Japon de hacerse un "Estado normal" cambiando el sistema de pais derrotado en la Segunda Guerra Mundial y elevando la posicion del sector de defensa.
					Para ese fin, ha tomado unas medidas de reforma en el sistema de defensa nacional.
					
					En noviembre y diciembre de 2006, ambas camaras de la Dieta aprobaron el proyecto de ley sobre la concesion de nivel ministerial a la Agencia de Defensa.
					
					El 9 de enero de 2007, tuvo lugar la ceremonia de apertura del Ministerio de Defensa.
					
					De esta manera, comenzo a funcionar normalmente esa cartera y el director general de la Agencia de Defensa fue ascendido como ministro.
					
					Esto fue un paso importante de Japon hacia el "Estado normal".
					
					La igualacion del rango del Ministerio de Defensa a otros ministerios del gabinete cambio el caracter importante del "Estado pacifista" que despues de terminada la Segunda Guerra Mundial, mantenia el bajo nivel de la rama de defensa.
					
					Por consiguiente, se consolidaron la posicion y el papel de ese sector en la estrategia estatal.
					
					El ministro de Defensa adquirio la autoridad de enviar a los uniformados a ultramar y ayudar materiales a EE.UU., etc., la cual tenia anteriormente el premier. 
					
					Quedaron consolidados el sistema de reaccion a los casos de emergencia y el de participacion en las actividades de la ONU para el mantenimiento de la paz.
					
					El problema esta en que tal reestructuracion forma parte de los preparativos de la nueva agresion para realizar la ambicion militarista usando las fuerzas armadas en la region y el resto del mundo.

articles.title: rasil: inaugurada exposicion coreana
articles.content:
Brasil: inaugurada exposicion coreana
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia primero en Brasil la exposicion de libros, fotos, bordados y artesanias de Corea con motivo del cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					En la sede se veian las obras del Presidente     Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente, las fotos alusivas a sus imborrables hazanas, los libros, fotos, bordados y articulos artesanales que dan a conocer a la Corea del Songun.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural estuvieron presentes las personalidades del ayuntamiento de la ciudad de Santos del Estado de Sao Paulo y del Partido Comunista Brasileno y los ciudadanos.
					
					El subalcalde de Santos expreso su satisfaccion por la apertura de la exposicion coreana en su ciudad.
					
					Manifesto la decision de esforzarse por profundizar el entendimiento entre los pueblos de ambos paises y desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion.
